original_title: Fitz & the Tantrums: Live From the Aragon Ballroom
overview: Fitz and The Tantrums return to Chicago and rock the crowd at the Aragon Ballroom for one fun-filled dance explosion. Set includes hits off their latest album "More Than Just a Dream" such as "The Walker" and "Out of My League".
title: Fitz & the Tantrums: Live From the Aragon Ballroom
